description: Bug 3666CodeCompletionHungry code assist (1GDRYW5) jkca (5/15/2001 11:04:56 AM)jresdk 106Under certain circumstances code assist eats too much code.Consider the enclosed class.As a programmer, I must add aparameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct.Steps:1. UI can decide whether it wants to use the codeassist end position (until the end of current identifier) or the cursor location it used to start with, so as to controlthe amount of source to replace. OB: Under certain circumstances, the code assist feature consumes more code than intended.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the enclosed class in the IDE.
2. Invoke code completion at the 'baz' call in the 'bar' method.
3. Notice that code assist modifies the code by adding an additional parameter to the 'baz' call, causing a compilation error.
